item.title: Apprentice Miller (Level 3)
item.description: Add only part of a file to the stage 117 times with git add -p.

item.title: Master Archivist (Level 7)
item.description: Prepare each commit with its patch in one file per commit with git format-patch

item.title: Seamstress (Level 5)
item.description: amended a commit with git commit --amend.

item.title: Apprentice Merchant (Level 3)
item.description: Added an external repository with git remote add.

item.title: Apprentice Miller (Level 2)
item.description: Add only part of a file to the stage 111 times with git add -p.

item.title: Socialite (Level 6)
item.description: pushed a branch to a remote repository using git push

item.title: Master Fisherman (Level 9)
item.description: Look for specified patterns in the current repository with git grep.

item.title: Caretaker
item.description: Added a .gitignore file to a repository.

item.title: Apprentice Architect (Level 1)
item.description: Created a new repository with git init.

item.title: Product Manager (Level 5)
item.description: Stash the changes in a dirty working directory away with git stash.

item.title: Apprentice Cleaning lady (Level 1)
item.description: Remove untracked files from the working tree with git clean

item.title: Master Historian (Level 9)
item.description: Investigate the commit log using git log.

item.title: Master Author (Level 8)
item.description: Made 2^Level commits using git commit.

item.title: Inventor (bstat)
item.description: Used a command that isn't part of the built in Git command

item.title: Master Butcher (Level 7)
item.description: Performed an interactive rebase using git rebase -i.

item.title: Blacksmith (Level 6)
item.description: Created a branch using git checkout -b.

item.title: Apprentice Messenger (Level 3)
item.description: Applied a patch using git am.

item.title: Locksmith (Level 6)
item.description: Add Signed-off-by line at the end of the commit log message using git commit -s.

item.title: Apprentice Messenger (Level 2)
item.description: Applied a patch using git am.

item.title: Presenter (Level 5)
item.description: Shows one or more objects (blobs, trees, tags and commits) with git show
